name: Don't Break The Chain
description:
You Are a  Toffee And You Found Yourself In An Unknown Place, And The Only Things You Have Is Fear, Confusion And a Chain...Wait... a Chain ? That Could Be Useful To Find Your Way Out Of Here.
Now Go Ahead And Die...I Mean Find Your Way Out.

This Game Is Made For Mini Game Gam #9 But I Missed The Submission Time.
